channel.title: Dave Winer
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: “They could ask Trump, for example, to host his own twitter, and people could subscribe to it anywhere, including Jack's twitter.”

item.title: Elizabeth Warren is a zombie too
item.description: 2016: There was a time when I would have voted for Elizabeth Warren for anything. For President, for god, for Fifth Beatle, you name it. But then something happened.
